GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-08N 006-20E AT 041800Z DEC.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORT TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: +332 9822 8888
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 111939Z DEC 18.
